sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均含"委员会"之意。
means: committee ： 既用作普通名词，也用作集体名词，指通过选举或其它方式而成立的一般委员会。
commission ： 指为了某项任务专门成立的委员会。

sentence.Network_en: This committee will enable decisions to be made democratically.
sentence.Network_cn: 该委员会将实现民主决议过程。

sentence.Network_en: He had been on the Nobel Prize committee's list of possibles.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在诺贝尔委员会列出的获奖候选者名单之列.

sentence.Network_en: Today its executive committee voted unanimously to reject the proposals.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天执行委员会投票一致否决了这些提案。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the general sense 'person to whom something has been entrusted'): from commit + -ee

entry.def: A committee is a group of people who meet to make decisions or plans for a larger group or organization that they represent.

example.ex: ...an elected Management Committee who serve the Association on a voluntary basis.
example.tran: 通过选举产生、自愿为协会服务的管理委员会

means.word_mean: 1. a special group delegated to consider some matter;

sentences.sentence: "a committee is a group that keeps minutes and loses hours" - Milton Berle

means.word_mean: 2. a self-constituted organization to promote something

auth_sentence.content: The committee has carried out a survey of practices.
auth_sentence.res_content: The committee has carried out a survey of practices.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The committee has carried out a survey of practices.

auth_sentence.content: How much heed will be taken by the committee?
auth_sentence.res_content: How much heed will be taken by the committee?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How much heed will be taken by the committee?

auth_sentence.content: The government will formally respond to the committee later.
auth_sentence.res_content: The government will formally respond to the committee later.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The government will formally respond to the committee later.

stems_affixes.word_buile: intermit[v.中断]+t+ent……的→adj.间歇的,断断续续的
per始终+mit送,放出,派,错过→始终放出→许可

stems_affixes.value_cn: 承认,供认;准许……进入,准许……加入
把……交托给,委托,委任;提交;犯[错误],干[坏事]
stems_affixes.word_buile: com共同+mit送,放出,派,错过→共同送→委托

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发出;放射;吐露;散发;发表;发行
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+mit送,放出,派,错过→送出[气味]等
inter在……中间+mit送,放出,派,错过→在中间送东西→打断,间断
sub在下面+mit送,放出,派,错过→放下面→屈服
per始终+mit送,放出,派,错过→始终放出→许可
re再次+mit送,放出,派,错过→再次放出,送[钱]→宽恕,汇款

Sentence.sentence: On the basis of the police report, the Lummis Accident Committee correctly determined that McLaughlin had been quite careless.
There are plenty of training courses in management techniques and committee work which you can attend now.
According to college folklore, a well-turned essay has the power to seduce (诱惑) an admissions committee.
In the 1930s,when only one in 10 Americans had a degree from a four-year college, an admissions committee was content to ask for a sample of applicants'chool papers to assess their writing ability
Applicants and their parents are said to believe that the personal essay can sway the admissions committee.

sentences.en: The committee has[have] decided to dismiss him.
The committee which was[who were] responsible for this decision would consider it over again.
sentences.cn: 对这一决定负责的委员会是会重新考虑它的。

jushi.english: The committee has〔have〕 decided to dismiss him.
The committee who were responsible for this decision would consider it over again.
jushi.chinese: 对这一决定负责的委员会重新考虑它的。

jushi.english: The committee which was responsible for this decision would consider it over again.
jushi.chinese: 对这一决定负责的委员会是会重新考虑它的。
